scripts.start-dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run build; dev_appserver.py app.yaml
scripts.build: npm run build-client; npm run build-admin-client
scripts.deploy: npm run build; gcloud app deploy
scripts.install-client-dependencies: cd ./client; npm install; cd ../admin-client; npm install
scripts.install-dependencies: npm install; pip install -t python_modules -r requirements.txt; npm run install-client-dependencies;
